Quick-Start
===========

Agilab is a software solution to explore AI for engineering. See
:doc:`documentation <index>` for more information.

LICENSE
^^^^^^^

New BSD. See :doc:`License File <license>`.

Install Agilab
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

If you want to install on a cluster, you need to provide the installer an account that can perform an SSH connection with key authentication or credentials.

.. code-block:: console

   mkdir agi-workspace && cd agi-workspace
   uv add agilab
   uv run agilab

Support
^^^^^^^
